クラス
org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Partitionerの使用

  • Partitionerを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce  
    org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output  
    org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.partition  

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduceでのPartitionerの使用

      Partitioner型の引数を持つ型を返すorg.apache.hadoop.mapreduceのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Class<? extends Partitioner<?,?>> JobContext.getPartitionerClass()
      Get the Partitioner class for the job.
      Partitioner型の型引数を持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapreduceのメソッド・パラメータ 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void Job.setPartitionerClass(Class<? extends Partitioner> cls)
      Set the Partitioner for the job.

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.outputでのPartitionerの使用

      Partitioner型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.outputのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static <K extends WritableComparable<?>,V extends Writable> 
      Writable      		 MapFileOutputFormat.getEntry(org.apache.hadoop.io.MapFile.Reader[] readers, Partitioner<K,V> partitioner, K key, V value)
      Get an entry from output generated by this class.

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.partitionでのPartitionerの使用

      org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.partitionでのPartitionerのサブクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  BinaryPartitioner<V>
      Partition BinaryComparable keys using a configurable part of the bytes array returned by BinaryComparable.getBytes().
      class  HashPartitioner<K,V>
      Partition keys by their Object.hashCode().
      class  KeyFieldBasedPartitioner<K2,V2>
      Defines a way to partition keys based on certain key fields (also see KeyFieldBasedComparator.
      class  RehashPartitioner<K,V>
      This partitioner rehashes values returned by Object.hashCode() to get smoother distribution between partitions which may improve reduce reduce time in some cases and should harm things in no cases.
      class  TotalOrderPartitioner<K,V>
      Partitioner effecting a total order by reading split points from an externally generated source.
